body: Wonderful issue, wish there would be more doujin with the entire Paris cast. Furthermore a good example that Hanabi, Coquelicot, partly Erica (cause they're innocent) and Glycine (cause she' of nobility and bitchy) are the  preferred rape-victims of japanese-artist, while Lobelia-san stands out as something unique. Nearly the entire Fleur Division acts reluctant, forced, even traumatised while serving some ugly bastards. Except for Lobelia-san, who gives the dude she's serving (a normal dude like me and you) a fabulous blow- and handjob. She ain't forced to perform a titjob and voluntarily consumes his semen, giving the dude the ride of his life.  Only on the last pic she thinks a bit disparaging "nouveau riche". Overall great work.
